title: Ticket #1820: Update tool documentation for -daemon
description:
Ticket #1606 renamed -subsystem to -daemon for condor_reconfig, condor_restart, condor_off, condor_on. The man pages and manual references should get updated as well. The -help output already reports "daemon" instead of "subsystem".

It is sufficient to s/subsystem/daemon/ in the following locations...

http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.5/condor_off.html
http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.5/condor_on.html
http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.5/condor_reconfig.html
http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.5/condor_restart.html

Side note, probably worth a separate ticket:

  • condor_restart can change DAEMON_LIST, as of #1306 (7.5.3)
  • There is no condor_reconfigure command
